meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>mouth</radical> is like an <radical>escalator</radical> you use to <kanji>suck</kanji> and <kanji>inhale</kanji> things into your body.
readingMnemonic: Use this mouth ability to <kanji>suck</kanji> <reading>cu</reading>cumbers (きゅう) into your mouth. Cucumbers are shaped like cylinders so you can suck them into your mouth like this. Just as nature intended.
